trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around October 23rd 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was about 2pm on a perfectly clear day. My wife noticed a glowingcylinder-like object that was looming very high in the sky, not really movingmuch. It kept changing shapes, moving almost like a worm. Then it formed anarrow shape and made a few very quick moves, only to return to its originallocation and start the worm-like moves again. I watched for nearly 15 minutes,and kept wondering what it could possibly be. At first I thought it was a lostkite, but it was so big, and so high, and it held its position for so long Ididnt think it could be that. Plus, it was such a clear day and it was so high,I figured if it was kite or something like that, I would see the shiny materialrelfecting in the sun, but it held a constant glow, and didnt make anyreflections even when it moved. It HAD to be a UFO and I dont really believe inthem.
